data.name: 凯尔文 - Kelvin And The Chateau
data.detailed_description:
Introduction

A fire destroyed Kelvin's home and took away his delightful childhood. Even after the disaster, his youth remained empty and uninteresting because of his tarnished family. The past has overlaid a layer of inferiority until he met his precious friends such as his pen pal Elledaz. When the final is over, it's time for him to go home.

Kelvin is a free, pixel-style RPG. You'll play as Kelvin, meet the Queen from the City of Sighs, make all kinds of new friends, experience school life, and reveal the truth of your family. Your new life is ahead, so get ready for it!

This gameplay will normally last for two hours.

Instruction

Move: ↑↓←→

Run: Shift
Confirm: Space/Enter
Menu: X
Fullscreen: F4

Developers

Iz is a high school student who is responsible for the game’s story, art and code.

English Localization and Twitter promo: Carlisle

You can find us on Twitter: Kelvin and the Chateau

data.short_description: My home was destroyed by a fire, and only my mother and I survived. Why me? After leaving his control-freak mother, Kelvin made a few friends and seemed to have a new answer to this question. However, his friends sometimes hide something from him.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Version of Windows
  • Processor: As long as your PC could boot
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: As long as your monitor could display
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: As long as your speaker could sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 98/Me/XP/Vista/7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel I3/I5/I7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GT1030
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Realtek
